title: [Question] How badly is cgpa affected if we mess up the first physics viva (on 3rd week of college)
content: They gave us 12 freaking experiments. I really don't know what to do. I only got like one night rn

comments.body: nostalgia lmao, chill out, it will barely affect it, and you can always tell him to take your viva in the next lab session
your isas and esas will hold far more weightage than a viva conducted 3 weeks into college, so it wonâ€™t affect it that much
bro wtf, i mean even if u do well in ISA and ESA u have very high probability of getting a F grade
it won't even effect i got A grade after getting 3 marks in lab
Ur viva contribute atleast 40% of ur total sgpa in 2or1 sem
yeah but he just missed one of the lab viva's, not all of them

your first viva holds all the weightage on your cgpa, 

im a 7th year student and i have gotten S grades across all my subjects for every year, but my cgpa is still only 6.2 because i messed up my first physics viva /s
Companies shortlist people especially on their first physics viva ( on 3rd week of college)
Companies shortlist people especially on their first physics viva ( on 3rd week of college)
Whose your teacher tho btw dont worry chill man it aint that big of a deal
Are people being sarcastic or real here?
Real, apple's first shortlisting criteria was 3rd week physics viva performance, some people who got full in viva were placed directly.
